Trails.Name: Lower Wanderer, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Old Log Rd, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Sun Bowl, Home Run, 91, Main Base Area

_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
12/30 2:55PM - Good afternoon, Stratton! Buckle up and lets talk about whats in store for tomorrow!

Were wrapping up 2025 on a high note with 59 ways down, all of which are scheduled for some quality time with the groomers overnight. After some snowmaking and resurfacing, Polar Bear will be coming back online tomorrow. For your way up, 12 lifts are set to spin at 8:30am with the possibility of delays due to high forecasted winds. Early access will be available for First Tracks pass holders. 

The park scene is coming to life with a 13-foot ramp Retro Halfpipe open and firing on East Byrnes Side, alongside 5 additional features to keep the laps rolling. Tyrolinne is also open with 6 features ready to ride.

We have some snow rolling in tomorrow and continuing into the New Year with 1-2 inches of accumulation possible. There will be a rise in temperatures ranging from 21-25 at the base and 12-16 up top. Its still a good idea to hang on to that extra layer and keep your face covered! Colder temperatures sticking around have allowed snowmaking and resurfacing operations to begin and will continue over the next several days as our team works to prepare the mountain for the New Year.

Tomorrow nights shaping up to be the perfect way to welcome the New Year! New Years Eve offers something for everyone, from a family buffet dinner in the Base Lodge to a 21+ Wild West themed party at Grizzlys with live music, a DJ, and firework views. Join us for the Firework Hike to mid-mountain for a one of a kind view of the fireworks. The Torchlight Parade begins at 8:30pm followed by our annual firework show! For the best viewing experience and to make sure you don't miss any of the action, make sure you're in your spot in the Main Base Area by 8:30pm. Cant wait to see you there!

Rest up and Ill see you bright and early for the last day of 2025! 

Safety Tip: Stay on the groomed portion of terrain. Never duck a rope, they are there for a reason.

Holiday week is in full swing with extended dining hours, live music, and special events keeping the Village looking lively. Check out our Holiday Week Dining, Aprs & Live Music Guide to see what's open, happening, and where the music is at. Theres something for everyone this Holiday week and we couldnt be more excited to celebrate with you! Click here to check out the upcoming Events Calendar.

Stay and relish the Green Mountains! Stratton Real Estate is here to help with all your real estate needs. Make your sweet escape a reality.

Reliable cars are the name of the game; that is why we trust Oliver Subaru and Ford. Made for all seasons and all families, check out Oliver Ford and Oliver Subaru for year-round reliability.
